definition: sharp piercing cry, utter a harsh abrupt scream
details:
noun
- sharp piercing cry
= synonyms: scream
- a high-pitched noise resembling a human cry
= example: a high-pitched noise resembling a human cry
= synonyms: scream
verb
- utter a harsh abrupt scream
= synonyms: squawk, screak, skreak, skreigh
- make a high-pitched, screeching noise
= synonyms: squeak
